mapper.select: SELECT p.*,ptName,pcName,psName,puName,pmcName FROM Store_Products p inner join Store_ProductTypes pt on pt.ptID=p.ptID inner join Store_ProductUnit pu on pu.puID=p.puID inner join Store_ProductColor pc on pc.pcID=p.pcID inner join Store_ProductSpec ps on ps.psID=p.psID inner join Store_PMC pmc on pmc.pmcID=p.pmcID WHERE productID = #{productID}
